half marathon training

If you’re thinking of training to run a half marathon any time soon, this half marathon training program will be a huge benefit to you. You’ll discover how and when to train, when and what to eat, how to avoid and treat injuries, the latest up to date training techniques and much, much more. This unique system is guaranteed to sky rocket your half marathon training progress on to new levels. Complete with 7 great bonuses, this running program could be described as an encyclopedia of modern running and is a must for any would be half marathon runner. 

http://www.halfmarathon-training.com

I'm a godless liberal with a bleeding heart. My only regret is that I have but one paycheck to give to my world.

lenders.occupational_info: I write a regular blog about my life (www.blurbfromtheburbs.blogspot.com) that shows all my failings, oddities and (hopefully) amusing conclusions.  I also wrote a book, 'Work/Life Balance for  Dummies' (Australia, UK and Germany) and continue that theme by writing articles for the Age and Sydney Morning Herald newspapers.  I also love doing book reviews for The Big Issue Magazine (Australia) and other publications - free books is a writer's dream. Finally, I do chocolate reviews for GoneChocco (www.gonechocco.com) because Aussies know that chocolate's not just for breakfast any more.  In short, I try to say 'yes' to any opportunity that comes my way, and have recently received a grant to tackle the litter issue in my area and to develop some 'heritage walk' maps that celebrate the history and cultural diversity of my beloved neighbourhood.

lenders.occupational_info: I am a young entrepreneur from South Africa tryin to help young people in Townships to survive off their creative gifts. For more info, visit http://nqo.yolasite.com

lenders.name: Christopher
lenders.loan_because: Giving is the rent I pay for living.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach and do research in psychology and the natural environment.

lenders.name: Steph
lenders.loan_because: I took a Human Rights class this semester in university and was introduced to Kiva. I believe that Kiva is doing great work by spreading the idea of microfinance via the internet. This organization proves that a little bit does go a long way.
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently a student in university. I will be graduating in a few months and continuing on to a career in financial planning.
